verses.roman:
mādhavendra-purī tathā gelā 'ekeśvare'
dugdha-dāna-cchale kṛṣṇa sākṣāt dila tāṅre

synonyms: mādhavendra-purī—Mādhavendra Purī; tathā—there; gelā—went; ekeśvare—alone; dugdha-dāna-chale—on the plea of giving milk in charity; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; sākṣāt—direct audience; dila—gave; tāṅre—unto him.
translation: "Mādhavendra Purī went to Vṛndāvana alone, and Kṛṣṇa, on the pretext of giving him milk, granted him an audience.
